lead_paragraph: The only distillery permitted to make the legendary Polish vodka called zubrowka has created a very close approximation of the spirit, now available in the United States.
snippet: The only distillery permitted to make the legendary Polish vodka called zubrowka has created a very close approximation of the spirit, now available in the United States.

headline.main: Polish Vodka Arrives With a Wisp of Grass
headline.seo: A Faux Bison-Grass Vodka Arrives in U.S.
headline.print_headline: Polish Vodka Arrives With a Wisp of Grass
